entities.name: kraacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who lives in the house. He has a life's ambition to have his head cut off and stuck up on a plaque just like his mother.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who thinks that Harry, Ron, and Hermione should be kind to Kreacher.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who asks about Kreacher and has anger towards Dumbledore.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who talks about Kreacher's life's ambition and is irritated by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who defends Kreacher and mentions that Dumbledore thinks they should be kind to him.
